name: MakeColor
summary: A hex color library to programatically assign colors using SWIFT.
description: Make Color is a lightweight and easy to use SWIFT library created to programatically change assign color using hex values. Coming from a web background, the RGB color system of SWIFT and XCODE can be a little confusing, so we made 7 simple functions to help you out. There are also a number of built in color schemes taht we have set up for you
